pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interact with the 'PADRINO' IPM Database // 'PADRINO' houses textual representations of Integral Projection Models which can be converted from their table format into full kernels to reproduce or extend an already published analysis. 'Rpadrino' is an R interface to this database. For more information on Integral Projection Models, see Easterling et al. (2000) doi:10.1890/0012-9658(2000)081[0694:SSSAAN]2.0.CO;2, Merow et al. (2013) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12146, Rees et al. (2014) doi:10.1111/1365-2656.12178, and Metcalf et al. (2015) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12405. See Levin et al. (2021) for more information on 'ipmr', the engine that powers model reconstruction doi:10.1111/2041-210X.13683.
